attributes.action: Introduce PR before the next election destroys the Conservative Party.
attributes.additional_details:
This nation has suffered too long in the grip of a duopoly where both parties are ideologically bankrupt & internally divided.
We swing from one extreme to another with each party spending half of its energy undoing what the other party did & the other half trying to quell its internal divisions.
A coalition government was elected in order to enact reform, but the reform they offered was a reform that nobody wanted.
The division in the ruling party since has brought the nation down very low.
attributes.background:
Polls suggests that the Conservative Party will be almost completely wiped out at the next election.
The prospect of a Labour government with a majority as big as predictions suggest is frightening for many people, even if they relish the prospect of the end of the Tories.
PR should mitigate that.

rejection.details:
